verbs.description: Trump [V: is] threatening to withhold support from nations who do n't back the bid by the U.S. , Canada and Mexico to host the 2026 World Cup .
[ARG0: Trump] is [V: threatening] [ARG1: to withhold support from nations who do n't back the bid by the U.S. , Canada and Mexico to host the 2026 World Cup] .
[ARG0: Trump] is threatening to [V: withhold] [ARG1: support] [ARG2: from nations who do n't back the bid by the U.S. , Canada and Mexico to host the 2026 World Cup] .
Trump is threatening to withhold support from nations who [V: do] n't back the bid by the U.S. , Canada and Mexico to host the 2026 World Cup .
Trump is threatening to withhold support from [ARG0: nations] [R-ARG0: who] do [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: back] [ARG1: the bid by the U.S. , Canada and Mexico to host the 2026 World Cup] .
Trump is threatening to withhold support from nations who do n't back the bid by the U.S. , Canada and Mexico to [V: host] [ARG1: the 2026 World Cup] .
